text.section: A provision specifying the percentage of loss or claim for which each such company shall be liable.

A provision that any notice, sworn statement, or proof of loss which may be required by the provisions of the policy may be rendered, made, or given to any one of such companies or to the agent named in the policy as the duly authorized agent of the companies, and that such notice, sworn statement, or proof of loss so rendered, made, or given shall be valid and binding as to all such companies.

A provision that, in any action or suit under the policy, service of process may be made on any one of such companies and that such service shall be deemed valid and binding service upon all such companies.
